name: CGDisplayStreamUpdateRectType
desc: Use these constants to determine which rectangles your app is interested in.

items.name: case refreshedRects
items.desc: The rectangles for the portions of the display that were redrawn.

items.name: case movedRects
items.desc: The rectangles for the portions of the display that were simply moved from one part of the display to another.

items.name: case dirtyRects
items.desc: The union of both rectangles that were redrawn and rectangles that were moved.

items.name: case reducedDirtyRects
items.desc: The union is calculated and then simplified. This reduces the number of rectangles returned to your app, but it may report some pixels that were not actually changed.
